channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Multi-Patient Illness; INC#1363; 06:57PM; LAX Terminal 2; MAP: https://bit.ly/44dW97C; #Westchester; PRELIM: 6 crew members ( Two Pilots / 4 Flight Attendants ) from an arriving single-aisle commercial passenger jet that had already deplaned passengers, were found standing on a jetway, complaining of headaches after they noted an odor (they surmise to be aircraft exhaust) within the aircraft after landing. The odor had dissipated upon airline ground crew and LAFD arrival. LAFD responders closely examined the aircraft cabin and cockpit with specialized instruments, and found no environmental hazard. One of the crew members has declined transportation, the other five are now being taken to an area hospital by LAFD ambulance in fair condition for further observation. Media Inquiries: LAX Operations.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E62 E67 EM9 RA5 RA62 RA837 RA864 RA867 SQ21 T5 T63; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1275; 07:03PM; 13100 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBDjQp; #BeverlyCrest; Solo vehicle (overturned?) with five occupants total, two of whom were ejected. Three were transported to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics, and two declined transportation and remain at scene. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Incident #3304; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E99 EM14 EM17 EM9 RA78 RA837 RA858 RA860 RA97 RA99 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1275; 06:15PM; 13100 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBDjQp; #BeverlyCrest; Solo vehicle (overturned?) with five occupants, two of whom were ejected. The three others have lesser injuries. Details pending.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E99 EM14 EM17 EM9 RA78 RA837 RA860 RA97 RA99 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1275; 05:57PM; 13100 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NBDjQp; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Traffic collision. Possibly with two ejected patients.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E99 EM14 RA78 RA858 RA99; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1186; 05:30PM; 7227 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XDhDYP; #ManchesterSquare; The first arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters mounted a quick and well-coordinated fire attack, confining flames within one business in the central section of a one-story L-shaped commercial building, extinguishing the fire in just 25 minutes. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 E66 EM13 RA266 RA66 RA866 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1186; 05:05PM; 7227 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XDhDYP; #ManchesterSquare; PRELIM: Offensive fire attack, with fire showing from one-story L-shaped commercial building.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E266 E33 E57 E64 E66 EM13 RA266 RA66 RA866 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0727; 12:46PM; 5101 N San Feliciano Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O69aKR; #WoodlandHills; 18 LAFD Firefighters took just 17 minutes to confine and fully extinguish flames to an attached garage and nearby vegetation at a 1,500 square foot one-story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA84 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0727; 12:29PM; 5101 N San Feliciano Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3O69aKR; #WoodlandHills; PRELIM: Well involved fire within the attached garage of a one story single family home.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA84 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - FIRE OUT; INC#0260; 06:03AM; 1607 N Vista St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44r21d7; Hollywood; FIRE NOW OUT: In 29 minutes, 52 firefighters extinguished a one story single family dwelling, well involved in fire upon LAFD arrival. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. 9-1-1 call received at 5:34AM. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E203 E227 E229 E235 E261 E27 E3 E41 E61 E82 E97 EM14 HR3 RA27 RA3 RA41 RA803 RA827 T27 T29 T3 T35 T61 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0082; 02:57AM; 4163 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44ldFWQ; Historic South-Central; Over 80 firefighters extinguished this Greater Alarm fire in one hour and 33 minutes with no injuries reported. There are hot spots and small pockets of fire remaining which will be held in check while the RS3 robotic firefighting vehicle is prepared for deployment and makes entry. The structural instability renders it unsafe for firefighters to complete extinguishment with an interior attack. LAFD Arson is on scene for the investigation, per protocol for a fire of this magnitude. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 BC706 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E210 E215 E221 E233 E3 E33 E46 E66 EA1 EM1 HE1 RA15 RA46 RA803 RA846 RS3 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart
